amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 891 the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of H.R. 5674, as reported by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, modified by the amendment printed in Part B of H.Res. 891 is considered adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 891 the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of H.R. 5674, as reported by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, modified by the amendment printed in Part B of H.Res. 891 is considered adopted.
